mapper.insert: insert into tb_comment (board_id, comment, user_id) values (#{boardId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{comment,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.select: SELECT c.comment, c.id, u.id as userId, u.name as writer from tb_comment AS c LEFT JOIN tb_user AS u ON c.user_id = u.id WHERE c.board_id = #{boardId, jdbcType=INTEGER}
